sentences.sContent: We must bestir ourselves to get there on time.
sentences.sContent_eng: We must bestir ourselves to get there on time.
sentences.sCn: 我们得尽量按时到达那里。

sentences.sContent: The timer in the TV would spring your TV on time.
sentences.sContent_eng: The timer in the TV would spring your TV on time.
sentences.sCn: 电视机内的定时器可以准时启动打开电视机。

sentences.sContent: If you can't arrive there on time, you should warn them.
sentences.sContent_eng: If you can't arrive there on time, you should warn them.
sentences.sCn: 如果你不能按时到达，应该预先通知他们。
